show.body: Show(${1:float afArg1 = 0.0}, ${2:float afArg2 = 0.0}, ${3:float afArg3 = 0.0}, ${4:float afArg4 = 0.0}, ${5:float afArg5 = 0.0}, ${6:float afArg6 = 0.0}, ${7:float afArg7 = 0.0}, ${8:float afArg8 = 0.0}, ${9:float afArg9 = 0.0})${0}

showashelpmessage.body: ShowAsHelpMessage(${1:string asEvent}, ${2:float afDuration}, ${3:float afInterval}, ${4:int aiMaxTimes}, ${5:string asContext=\"\"}, ${6:int aiPriority=0})${0}
